alert.note: Alert for Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 5:00AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Peshtigo River near Porterfield affecting Marinette County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Peshtigo River near Porterfield. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Area boat docks begin flooding and there is widespread flooding of wooded lowland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:05 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:05 AM CDT Saturday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.
